items.question: Is this service free?
items.answer: Yes, our TikTok downloader is completely free to use.

items.question: What video quality can I download?
items.answer: We provide the highest quality available from the original TikTok video.

items.question: Can I download private videos?
items.answer: No, you can only download public TikTok videos.

items.question: Is there a limit to how many videos I can download?
items.answer: Currently there are no strict limits, but please use the service responsibly.
